price: 64 Allah a maudit les mécréants auxquels Il a préparé un brasier ardent
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
